channel.title: Comments on: 24 Hours of PASS: WIT Edition – Awesome Women I’d Love to Hear Talk SQL
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Julie Smith
item.dc:creator: Julie Smith
item.description: What a great post. I am blown away to be included on the list. Thank you, Jes, you are an amazing young lady!
item.content:encoded: What a great post. I am blown away to be included on the list. Thank you, Jes, you are an amazing young lady!

item.title: By: Gail Shaw
item.dc:creator: Gail Shaw
item.content:encoded:
Not sure why I’m top of your list. Order by NewID() perhaps? ðŸ™‚

I submitted, probably my wackiest session title ever. I also found out that Tom’s been under-quoting the number of sessions submitted to try and get more people to submit.

item.title: By: Kendra Little
item.dc:creator: Kendra Little
item.content:encoded:
[momentarily speechless]

I have submitted a session! Thank you so much for your kind words and your support.

item.title: By: Jes Schultz Borland (grrlgeek)
item.dc:creator: Jes Schultz Borland (grrlgeek)
item.content:encoded:
Jen, Michelle, Andi, and Karen – You’re welcome. I admire each of you.

Mark – I’d be happy to hear who I missed! Please leave some names in the comments.

One person I did miss was Cindy Gross. She rocks too. And Sarah Dutkiewicz, while not a SQL person, could teach all of us about PoSH or several other topics.

item.title: By: Karen Lopez
item.dc:creator: Karen Lopez
item.content:encoded:
I’m very honoured to be listed here. So hoping every single person mentioned will submit an abstract or two.

Looking forward to #24hop

item.title: By: Lady Runa
item.dc:creator: Lady Runa
item.description: ::BLUSH:: you really think I can do a 24HOP talk? I'm honored. I'm not sure what I'd talk about. I'll take suggestions. :)
item.content:encoded: ::BLUSH:: you really think I can do a 24HOP talk? I’m honored. I’m not sure what I’d talk about. I’ll take suggestions. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Mark Broadbent
item.dc:creator: Mark Broadbent
item.description: Agree with all your entries in the list, a few missing but impossible to capture everyone. This is going to be an interesting event.
item.content:encoded: Agree with all your entries in the list, a few missing but impossible to capture everyone. This is going to be an interesting event.

item.title: By: Michelle Ufford
item.dc:creator: Michelle Ufford
item.description: Wow! Thanks, Jes! I'm honored to be on your list. And I'm really glad that you submitted an abstract. I'm positive you'd be amazing. You're a fun, intelligent woman with a great personality, and I think that will resonate with any audience you present to. Good luck! :)
item.content:encoded: Wow! Thanks, Jes! I’m honored to be on your list. And I’m really glad that you submitted an abstract. I’m positive you’d be amazing. You’re a fun, intelligent woman with a great personality, and I think that will resonate with any audience you present to. Good luck! ðŸ™‚
